column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////I am rarely tempted by sprawling brunch menus because my eyes are immediately drawn to eggs benedict dishes
column2: but somehow Wildberry managed to capture my rarely-present sweet tooth and convinced me to order the Berry Bliss Crepes. I thought to myself
column5: and the crepes should be nice and light and I won't go into a food coma after lunch." Well
column7: and they were nice and light
column8: but the fact that there were THREE on the plate put a wrench in my "no food coma" plans. They were so good
column9: I just couldn't stop myself...My lunch mates were equally impressed with their omelets and sides of specialty pancakes
column10: and their portions were equally as large as mine. Whew
